block.p: It happens in the confusions of adolescence and the yearning for identity: Black children and white children who were fast friends move into separate worlds. How Race Is Lived in America: the ninth article of a series.

Plus: Patients facing serious medical issues can no longer count on their doctors to tell them what to do. And a look at the new landscape of AIDS. Special sections on Women's Health and Men & Health.
